title: BlackRock bows to SEC pressure on Bitcoin ETF cash creations model
description: BlackRock amends Bitcoin ETF filing, bending to SEC guidance pressing cash creations over in-kind, eyeing eventual in-kind return.

title: Franklin Templeton’s Executive Expects All Nations to Hold Bitcoin — ‘Every Country Is Going to Have to Hold Some Reserves’
description: An executive at trillion-dollar asset manager firm Franklin Templeton expects bitcoin to become “something that every treasury needs to hold.” She believes that “every country is going to have to hold some reserves,” emphasizing that the cryptocurrency is “working its way increasingly into the traditional banking ecosystem as just a foundational part of that system.” […]

title: Grayscale and Hashdex face SEC setback in ETF approval timeline
description: The U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) has deferred decisions on several proposed Ethereum-focused exchange-traded funds (ETFs). The SEC announced the initiation of proceedings for the Hashdex Nasdaq Ethereum ETF and the Grayscale Ethereum Futures Trust, soliciting public input on whether these ETFs should be permitted to be listed. Public input sought for Ethereum ETFs […]
